name: Jawan
info: A high-octane action thriller that outlines the emotional journey of a man who is set to rectify the wrongs in society.

name: Kushi
info: A couple who are predicted to have a failed marriage, decide to become ideal partners for each other. Will it work out or will they realize that their parents were right?

name: Mark Antony
info: Mark, a skilled mechanic and the son of a former gangster, stumbles upon a time-travelling phone that can save his estranged mother from a grim fate, but he must navigate through dangerous consequences of altering the past while facing his own family's legacy.

name: Ms Shetty Mr Polishetty
info: While Miss Shetty is a feminist living in London and wants to be single forever, Mr. Polishetty from Hyderabad wants to be in a committed relationship. Despite being in different stages of life, they connect.

name: The Nun 2
info: The sequel to the worldwide smash hit follows Sister Irene as she once again comes face-to-face with Valak, the demon nun.

name: Rememory
about: Gordon, a visionary inventor of the Rememory machine that allows him to see memories. He dies in his office. Is it murder? Sam investigates by using the machine borrowed from Gordon's wife. He looks at the memories of others involved

name: Transfusion
about: A former Special Forces operative thrusts himself into the criminal underworld to keep his only son from being taken from him.

name: Smoother Series 3
about: After the turmoil and Finn`s subsequent injuries, Grace returns to London. Finn is furious about his ordeal despite the Ahern family`s honesty. Will the entire truth about Denis` death finally be revealed.

name: The Space in Between
about: The Space In Between is a slice-of-life suspenseful drama about a young painter, Umair, as he struggles to sell his work in the aftermath of the COVID-19 pandemic.

name: Mending The Line
about: A wounded veteran adjusts to life post-combat with the help of a headstrong fly fisherman.

name: Kisi Ko Batana Mat Ft. Anubhav Singh Bassi
Who Are You by Rahul Subramanian
Kal Ki Chinta Nahi Karta ft. Ravi Gupta
Talk Session in Business (Ft. Jaideep Prabhu)
about: About Session | Business Administration & Finance

name: Learn Digital Marketing and Adobe Photoshop
about: Learn digital marketing & Adobe photoshop to give a perfect start to your career. Gain access to Up-To-Date content & Expert-led courses, on-demand Video Tutorials.

name: Talk Session in Multimedia (Ft. Jeremy Polgar)
about: About Session | Multimedia

name: Campus to Corporate for Students & Professionals
about: Campus to Corporate is a special training program designed for freshers & young professionals. It teaches all necessary skills that help students transition smoothly into a successful corporate life.

name: Talk Session in Med-Science (Ft. Julia Schaletzky)
about: About Session | Medical Science

name: Manam Theatre Festival 2023
category_type: Comedy, Drama | Bengali, English, Hindi, Kannada, Malayalam, Tamil, Telugu, Dakhini
about: Spanning across four weekends from November 24, 2023 to December 17, 2023, the Manam Theatre Festival hopes to immerse theatre aficionados in Hyderabad in the sheer magic and brilliance of the performing arts, as it brings together the city’s thriving theatre fraternity along with visiting troupes from across the country, and beyond

name: Manam Theatre Festival 2023
about: An excerpt from the Indian epic -Ramayana, Adishakti`s Bali was written by Nimmy Raphel. Adishakti’s Bali is a retelling of the various events that led up to the battle between Bali and Ram, and eventually, the death of Bali.

name: Aadhe Adhure
about: Aadhe Adhure is a compelling theatre production that delves deep into the intricacies of human relationships and the unfulfilled desires that haunt us all. Through brilliant performances and a poignant script, it tells the story of Savitri, a woman trapped between societal expectations and personal dreams.

name: Manam Theatre Festival: Shakkar Ke Paanch Daane
about: In the play Shakkar Ke Paanch Dane, the protagonist Rajkumar embarks on an unexpected journey, initially doubting his abilities. However, as he seeks a solution to his predicament, he discovers a newfound desire to express himself, drawing inspiration from the five individuals in his life, including Maa, Uncle Pindaric, Raghu, and the anonymous ’Truckwala Dost.’. This journey reflects the universal struggle to recognize and value one’s own voice and perspectives.

name: Sutradhar presents Dushala
about: Dushala, the character from our epic Mahabharata, the only daughter of Dhritarashtra and Gandhari, talks about her pain and anguish over the ages and yearns for an identity for herself. Here, we are not only talking about the Kaurava princess, but about the women in general, about all the daughters, sisters, wives and mothers around us.

name: Ramoji Festive Studio Tour
category_type: Adventure Parks, Theme parks | English, Telugu, Hindi | 12hrs
about: Welcome to Ramoji Film City, where every day is a celebration to rejoice! Experience festival celebrations in one of India's top vacation spots and immerse yourself in a world of fun and holiday cheer, filmy entertainment, and vivacious cultural activities.

name: Wonderla Amusement Park Hyderabad
about: Begin the Journey of Wonders at our Amusement Park in Hyderabad

name: Speed Dating
category_type: Parties | English, Hindi, Kannada, Malayalam, Tamil, Telugu, Bengali | 18yrs + | 2hrs
about: Tired of swiping and texting? Come, join us at our social mixer to meet potential dates and friends in real life.
